title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Online Science Communication Using Facebook-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners engage in asynchronous knowledge-sharing activities with peers using Facebook group features at a rate of over 80%.
Learners provide constructive feedback at least twice weekly in discussion threads on scientific topics.

Learners design a project integrating the Facebook API with an enterprise internal task management system over a 6-month long-term course, meet weekly milestones (requirements analysis, prototype development, testing, documentation), and submit a final output scoring over 80 points based on evaluation criteria (functionality 70%, usability 20%, completeness 10%).
Learners achieve a score of 4.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in a social presence survey at the course’s conclusion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
